title: Indian govt introduced RS 2000 women scheme, is it considered bribe, can we take it assim al hakeem
transcript: sh I'm from India and the government of my state introduced a scheme for women that they will give 2,000 amount per month for assistance though I don't know the intention behind this as the election is there in upcoming five months is it considered as a person to receive this amount as a bribe to attain the votes from voter if the state grants you a gift and it's unconditional it's not alone that you have to pay in in addition to some interest to it and it's unconditional they don't force you to vote for them or for any other um party it's just a gift there's no problem in taking it inshallah
